special_text:
[+1]: Untap up to two other target permanents. They gain hexproof until your next turn.
[-2]: Until end of turn, Helene becomes a 4/4 Human Warrior creature with hexproof, trample, and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card” that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
